verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> upon <WH413> Nehiloth, <WH5155> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> Give ear <WH238> to my words, <WH561> O LORD, <WH3068> consider <WH995> my meditation. <WH1901>
Hearken <WH7181> unto the voice <WH6963> of my cry, <WH7773> my King, <WH4428> and my God: <WH430> for <WH3588> unto <WH413> thee will I pray. <WH6419>
My voice <WH6963> shalt thou hear <WH8085> in the morning, <WH1242> O LORD; <WH3068> in the morning <WH1242> will I direct <WH6186> my prayer unto thee, and will look up. <WH6822>
For <WH3588> thou <WH859> art not <WH3808> a God <WH410> that hath pleasure <WH2655> in wickedness: <WH7562> neither <WH3808> shall evil <WH7451> dwell <WH1481> with thee.
The foolish <WH1984> shall not <WH3808> stand <WH3320> in <WH5048> thy sight: <WH5869> thou hatest <WH8130> all <WH3605> workers <WH6466> of iniquity. <WH205>
Thou shalt destroy <WH6> them that speak <WH1696> leasing: <WH3577> the LORD <WH3068> will abhor <WH8581> the bloody <WH1818> and deceitful <WH4820> man. <WH376>

But as for me, <WH589> I will come <WH935> into thy house <WH1004> in the multitude <WH7230> of thy mercy: <WH2617> and in thy fear <WH3374> will I worship <WH7812> toward <WH413> thy holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
Lead <WH5148> me, O LORD, <WH3068> in thy righteousness <WH6666> because of <WH4616> mine enemies; <WH8324> make thy way <WH1870> straight <WH3474> before my face. <WH6440>

For <WH3588> there is no <WH369> faithfulness <WH3559> in their mouth; <WH6310> their inward part <WH7130> is very wickedness; <WH1942> their throat <WH1627> is an open <WH6605> sepulcher; <WH6913> they flatter <WH2505> with their tongue. <WH3956>

Destroy <WH816> thou them, O God; <WH430> let them fall <WH5307> by their own counsels; <WH4480> <WH4156> cast them out <WH5080> in the multitude <WH7230> of their transgressions; <WH6588> for <WH3588> they have rebelled <WH4784> against thee.

But let all <WH3605> those that put their trust <WH2620> in thee rejoice: <WH8055> let them ever <WH5769> shout for joy, <WH7442> because thou defendest <WH5526> them: <WH5921> let them also that love <WH157> thy name <WH8034> be joyful <WH5970> in thee.
For <WH3588> thou, <WH859> LORD, <WH3068> wilt bless <WH1288> the righteous; <WH6662> with favor <WH7522> wilt thou compass <WH5849> him as with a shield. <WH6793>
